subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Orlando Hernández pitched seven strong innings to lead the Mets in Game 1 against the Washington Nationals. But in Game 2, the Mets not only lost the game, they also potentially lost catcher Paul Lo Duca.
snippet: Orlando Hernández pitched seven strong innings to lead the Mets in Game 1 against the Washington Nationals. But in Game 2, the Mets not only lost the game, they also potentially lost catcher Paul Lo Duca.
